title: Artificial insemination of cattle
creator_credit: Dartington Hall Film Unit and Tom Stobart
brief_description: This film illustrates, by means of actual scenes and animated diagrams, the process of the artificial insemination of cattle, stresses the importance of the practice to stockbreeders and shows just how a centre for this purpose is set up and run.
creator_credit_for_label: Dartington Hall Film Unit and Tom Stobart
